mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NUM, MANAGER_ID, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_REGDATE, NOTICE_HIT FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NOTICE_NUM DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE(NOTICE_NUM, MANAGER_ID, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_REGDATE, NOTICE_HIT) VALUES (BOARD_CUSTOMER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{managerId}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, SYSDATE, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_HIT = NOTICE_HIT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NUM = #{noticeNum}
